habits.title: Habits and Routine

items.q: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
items.a: Yes, absolutely. There are no long-term commitments. You can cancel from your dashboard with a single click and your access will remain until the end of the billing cycle.
Security is our priority. We use bank-grade encryption and comply with health data protection regulations. No one but you has access to the files.

items.q: What tools and tests are currently available?
items.a: Our library includes mental health tests (PHQ-9, BDI), development (M-CHAT), speech therapy, occupational therapy, and medical calculators. We add new tools monthly.

items.q: Do you offer plans for companies?
items.a: Yes, for clinics and hospitals contact us for a tailored plan.

items.q: Are my data and my patients' data private?
items.a: Absolutely. Your account is private and data is encrypted. We do not have access to your patients' clinical information.

items.q: Do you comply with data protection laws?
items.a: Yes, our infrastructure complies with GDPR and HIPAA, guaranteeing maximum confidentiality and ethical security.

items.q: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
items.a: Your data remains yours. You can export all your patients' and tests' information before closing your account.

items.q: Do you have support if something fails?
items.a: Yes, we have a specialized technical support team available 24/7 to resolve any inconvenience immediately.

About.title: Our Story
About.subtitle: Born from real necessity in daily clinical practice.
About.story_p1: It all started in my own practice. As a health professional, I was constantly frustrated by the immense amount of time I wasted manually scoring tests, adding up scores, and writing repetitive reports. Those were valuable hours I wasn't dedicating to my patients.
About.story_p2: I realized I wasn't alone; my colleagues shared the same administrative burnout. I understood that technology should be our ally, not a barrier. Thus Neurometrics was born: a platform designed by clinicians, for clinicians, with the mission to automate the tedious so we can refocus on the human aspect.

scientific_rigor.title: Scientific Rigor
scientific_rigor.desc: We never sacrifice validity for speed. Our tools are built on rigorous clinical evidence.

total_privacy.title: Total Privacy
total_privacy.desc: Your data and your patients' data are sacred. We comply with international security standards.

constant_innovation.title: Constant Innovation
constant_innovation.desc: We listen actively. The platform evolves based on what you need in your practice.

0.name: Dr. Elena Vaquerizo
0.text: Before, I spent hours tabulating the PHQ-9. Now it's instant, and the new visual graphs are excellent for explaining progress to the patient.

1.name: Dr. Samuel Cohen
1.text: The cognitive assessment suite is robust. It allows me to detect mild impairment much earlier than with traditional methods.

2.name: Mariana Castillo
2.text: The platform's customization is incredible. I can adapt the reports to what I really need to communicate to families.

3.name: Dr. Alberto Rossi
3.text: The anamnesis pre-filling tool is like having an extra assistant. Saved me at least 20 mins per patient.

4.name: Dr. Patricia Solis
4.text: Kids love the tablet interface. It's much less intimidating than pen and paper.

5.name: Lucas Mendez
5.text: Managing massive organizational climate assessments has never been easier. The aggregated reports are a gem.

ClinicalRecords.title: Smart Clinical Records
ClinicalRecords.desc: Optimized document management with automatic timeline and centralization of patient history.
ClinicalRecords.benefit: Regulatory compliance and total data security.

TestAutomation.title: Test Automation
TestAutomation.desc: Automated scoring and pre-report generation for over 50 neuropsychological batteries.
TestAutomation.benefit: Save up to 70% in scoring time.

AuraSupport.title: Aura AI Support 24/7
AuraSupport.desc: Immediate intelligent assistance integrated into your workstation to resolve clinical and operational doubts at all times.

MedicalCalculators.title: Medical Calculators
MedicalCalculators.desc: Instant access to norms, percentiles, and standard score calculations with algorithmic precision.

AICopilot.title: Clinical Copilot (IA)
AICopilot.desc: Intelligent assistance for synthesizing complex cases and detecting evolutionary patterns.

MobileAccess.title: Multi-device Access
MobileAccess.desc: Manage your workstation from anywhere with our optimized mobile application.
MobileAccess.benefit: Total fluidity between office and field.

ClinicalRecords.detailed_description: Complete digital clinical records system with automatic timeline, family and personal history management, and centralization of all patient information in one place. Compliant with all clinical data security and privacy standards.
benefits: Complete and chronological clinical history
Organized family and personal background
Evolution notes with customizable templates
Export to PDF with professional formatting
HIPAA and GDPR regulatory compliance

TestAutomation.detailed_description: Automatic scoring of over 50 neuropsychological and psychometric batteries. The system analyzes responses, calculates scores, percentiles, and generates clinical interpretations based on updated norms.
benefits: Instant test scoring
Automatic calculation of percentiles and T-scores
AI-suggested clinical interpretation
Norms localized by country and age
Save up to 70% of scoring time

MedicalCalculators.detailed_description: Access to precise medical calculators for BMI, medication dosages, risk scales, and more. All calculations can be inserted directly into the patient's clinical record with a single click.
benefits: Scientifically validated calculators
Direct integration with clinical record
Pediatric and geriatric dosages
Cardiovascular risk scales and more
Elimination of manual calculation errors

AICopilot.detailed_description: Intelligent assistant that analyzes clinical notes and suggests differential diagnoses, ICD-10 codes, and evidence-based recommendations. Designed to support, never replace, the clinician's professional judgment.
benefits: Differential diagnosis suggestions
Automatic ICD-10 and DSM-5 codes
Pattern detection in clinical evolution
Evidence-based therapeutic recommendations
Automatic synthesis of complex cases

MobileAccess.detailed_description: Access your workstation from any device. The platform is optimized to work perfectly on tablets and smartphones, allowing you to consult records, review results, and manage your schedule from anywhere.
benefits: Interface adaptable to any screen
Real-time synchronization
Offline mode for areas without connection
Tests optimized for touch devices
Instant result notifications

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro_body: At Neurometrics, we take the privacy of your data and that of your patients very seriously. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
Privacy.info_body: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email, professional information, and billing data. We also process patient data you enter into the platform, acting as data processors.
Privacy.usage_body: We use the information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.
Privacy.security_body: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your data, including encryption in transit and at rest.
Privacy.rights_body: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can exercise these rights by contacting us through our support.

Terms.title: Terms and Conditions
Terms.intro: Neurometrics is a digital services platform (hereinafter, "The Provider").
Terms.acceptance_body: By accessing and using Neurometrics, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, do not use our services.
Terms.use_body: You agree to use the platform only for lawful and professional purposes. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.
Terms.ip_body: All content, software, and technology of Neurometrics are the exclusive property of our company and are protected by intellectual property laws.
Terms.liability_body: Neurometrics provides the platform "as is". We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free. We are not responsible for clinical decisions made based on our reports.
Terms.modifications_body: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes.
Terms.mor_body: Our order process is conducted by our online reseller Paddle.com. Paddle.com is the Merchant of Record for all our orders. Paddle provides all customer service inquiries and handles returns.
Terms.support_body: For technical support, account questions, or payment assistance, you can contact us directly at support@neurometricslatam.com. We are available to resolve any inquiries.

Refund.title: Refund Policy
Refund.trial_body: We offer a 7-day free trial period for all our new plans. During this time, you can cancel your subscription at any time at no cost.
Refund.cancellation_body: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard. Cancellation will be effective at the end of the current billing cycle. You will have access to the service until the end of that cycle.
Refund.refunds_body: In compliance with Paddle's policies and our commitment to your satisfaction, we offer a 14-day refund window for initial subscriptions. If you are not satisfied with the service within the first 14 days of your purchase, you may request a full refund by contacting our support team.
Refund.contact_body: If you believe there has been a billing error, please contact us immediately at support@neurometricslatam.com to review your case.
Refund.changes_body: If you switch from one plan to another, the price adjustment will be prorated automatically on your next invoice.

Cookies.title: Cookies Policy
Cookies.what_body: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website.
Cookies.list_3: Analyze the usage of our site to improve it.
Cookies.essential: Essential: Necessary for the basic functioning of the site.
Cookies.analytical: Analytical: Help us understand how users interact with the platform.
Cookies.control_body: You can configure your browser to reject all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is sent. However, some service functions may not work properly without them.

Security.title: Security
Security.subtitle: How we protect your data and your patients' data.
Security.encryption_desc: Data encrypted in transit (TLS 1.2+) and at rest (AES-256).
Security.infra_desc: Hosted on secure AWS servers with ISO 27001 certifications.
Security.compliance_desc: Designed following HIPAA and GDPR standards.
Security.access_body: We use secure authentication via Supabase, with support for strong passwords and, soon, two-factor authentication (2FA).
Security.backup_body: We perform daily automatic backups of all databases to prevent data loss.
Security.report_body: If you find a security vulnerability, please report it immediately to support@neurometricslatam.com.

errors.price_not_configured: Price ID not configured for this plan.

clinical-records.title: Digital Clinical Record
clinical-records.emotionalTitle: Remember why you chose this vocation?
clinical-records.emotionalDesc: It wasn't to fill out endless forms or struggle with paper records. You heal, listen, and transform lives. Neurometrics gives that sacred time back to you.
clinical-records.problem: Bureaucracy consumes 40% of the time of a private session, wearing down the professional and distancing them from what really matters: the patient.
clinical-records.solution: Our Intelligent Clinical Record flows with you. Record progress in seconds, access history with one click, and let technology handle administrative details while you focus on care.
benefits: Goodbye to clutter: Everything centralized in one secure place.
Attention recovery: Less screen, more eye contact.
Ethical Security: Medical-grade encryption for your peace of mind.

test-automation.title: Test Automation
test-automation.emotionalTitle: Precision that grants peace of mind
test-automation.emotionalDesc: Doubt is the heaviest weight in a diagnosis. When a person's well-being depends on a score, there is no room for human error.
test-automation.problem: Correcting tests manually is tedious and prone to errors that can alter a vital clinical diagnosis.
test-automation.solution: Total automation. From PHQ-9 to complex cognitive scales. Get instant results with guaranteed scientific validity, allowing you to deliver impeccable reports in record time.
benefits: Zero errors: Validated algorithms ensuring total accuracy.
Instant reports: From response to report in one second.
Clinical Confidence: The technical backing your professionalism deserves.

medical-calculators.title: Medical Calculators
medical-calculators.emotionalDesc: In medicine, details are not small; they are fundamental. Every dose, every risk, and every index is a key piece in the healthcare puzzle.
medical-calculators.problem: Closing the gap between observation and mathematical precision can be stressful under clinical pressure.
medical-calculators.solution: A suite of high-precision calculation tools integrated into your workflow. BMI, pediatric dosing, surgical risks and more, always at your disposal to eliminate any uncertainty.
benefits: Safety in decision making: Precise data, safe decisions.
Professional Agility: Get critical results without leaving the consultation.
Scientific Rigor: Tools based on universal clinical formulas.

ai-copilot.title: AI Clinical Copilot
ai-copilot.emotionalDesc: The loneliness of the office can be overwhelming. There are cases that challenge our experience and force us to seek a second opinion.
ai-copilot.problem: Professional isolation and the cognitive load of analyzing thousands of clinical variables simultaneously.
ai-copilot.solution: A clinical decision assistant that never rests. Our AI analyzes patterns, suggests evidence-based protocols, and helps you structure your reasoning, empowering your skills, not replacing them.
benefits: Strategic Ally: A second pair of expert eyes analyzing every case.
Instant Evidence: Suggestions based on thousands of clinical protocols.
Mental Clarity: Reduce information fatigue with intelligent summaries.

mobile-access.title: Neurometrics Mobile
mobile-access.emotionalDesc: Healthcare happens everywhere, not just behind a desk. Real professional freedom is being able to care without being tied to an office.
mobile-access.problem: The rigidity of traditional systems that only work on a desktop computer.
mobile-access.solution: All the power of Neurometrics in your pocket. Apply tests during home visits, review records on the go, and maintain total control of your practice with an interface designed to be fluid, mobile, and secure.
benefits: Freedom of Movement: Your clinic travels with you, always.
Immediate Response: Evaluate and decide at the key moment, wherever you are.
Total Flexibility: Optimize your time between appointments intelligently.

common.cta_title: Dare to try Neurometrics and improve your practice
common.cta_desc: Join hundreds of specialists who have already reclaimed their time and precision. Clinical excellence is one click away.

alert.description: Changing your profession from {old} to {new} could affect some specific configurations and tools for your specialty available on the platform.

synthesis.title: Progress Synthesis
synthesis.trajectory: The longitudinal analysis of the data suggests a clinical trajectory that should be monitored.
synthesis.variations: Variations in the assessed indicators are observed over {count} sessions. It is fundamental to correlate these psychometric changes with treatment adherence and significant life events reported in the clinical interview.
synthesis.baseline: Having only one evaluation in this report establishes a baseline for future comparisons.
synthesis.recommendation: Recommendation: Continue periodic monitoring to establish the stability of the observed changes.

footer.generated_by: Progress Report automatically generated by Neurometrics Clinical Suite on {date}.
footer.confidentiality: This document is confidential and for the exclusive use of the treating professional.
